title: Bug 116609: Color orange doesn't work (Regression)
description: Bug 116609: Color orange doesn't work. Description: Color orange doesn't work.
OB: When inserting a report item and setting the color or background color to orange, the preview does not display the expected orange color. Instead, the color appears different or not applied at all.
EB: The expected behavior is that when setting the color or background color of a report item to orange, the preview should display the item with the correct orange color.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Observe the preview and note that the expected orange color is not displayed.
